stakeholder_summary.problem: Degraded document scans produce unusable OCR output with 1518 character errors
stakeholder_summary.solution: Automated image enhancement using GA-optimized PIL filter
stakeholder_summary.result: 89.7% error reduction - from unusable to production-ready OCR
stakeholder_summary.key_insight: Counter-intuitively, minimal enhancement (1.05x contrast, median=3) outperforms aggressive filtering
stakeholder_summary.business_value: Documents previously requiring manual processing can now be automated
